divs: sighting detailsi was not there. i went out after told by one witness to investigate. spoke w\an at sonoco gas station who said they have been around before. last nite sev. witnesses due to fireworks show. i have seen video& this is the. real deal. must see video. please contact 4 details. i am on my phone\must be brief here but will upload video. this was taken by. child & only one ufo but 4 were seen for a good 30-45 minutes. grew in size and turned red
Summary: Caught on video. 4 objects witnessed by least 11 people.
